value.name: Lubbock man indicted on 3 counts of continuous sexual abuse of a child
value.description: LUBBOCK, Texas (KCBD) - Johnny Taylor Jr, 20, of Lubbock has been indicted by a Lubbock County Grand Jury on a charge of continuous sexual abuse of a child. Taylor Jr. has been in jail since July 30, 2019. The indictment says from June 2018 through April ...
